pages.text: $(bred)Gargantuar$() is the zombie other zombies dream they could be. $(m)But he still can't find a girlfriend$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)300$()$(br)$(bred)Attack Damage$() : $(l)Deadly$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : $(bred)Enemies can not escape when being aimed by it$(). It will $(l)throw a Imp$() when health is lower than a half.
